description:
Heart of Fort Greene Historic District
walking distance to all subways, Barclays Center,
restaurants, Brooklyn Academy of Music and associated art centers, LIRR. 10 minutes from Manhattan. apartment has Laundry in unit
plus dishwasher
name: Historic Brownstone Fort Greene
review: We loved this brownstone!  Jason is a wonderful host!  There are places to eat and shop close by and the trains to the city are a short distance away!  Love, love, love!  We will miss Brooklyn!
